info.description: The flight edition trolleys have already had their fair share of flight experience. Each trolley has it's very own story to tell. Little dents and scratches bear witness of a life in the sky and make each trolley completely unique.Â Each trolley is overhauled completely, then cleaned thoroughly and tested for operational reliability. Only after these rigorous steps is the trolley revamped with a unique design.
info.name: trolley - flight edition
